Title: Fracture the Foci
Description:
If Maldra speaks the truth, the rebels are creating the runestones in the Emberslate Cavern.

Given the nature of these devices, we know there must be Primalist foci involved.

Destroy the foci. You will know them when you see them.

The rebels cannot be allowed to create any more weapons of destruction.
ObjectivesText: Destroy 4 Primalist Foci in Emberslate Cavern.
RewardText: Without those foci, the rebels will no longer be able to imbue their runestones with explosive flame.
